name: Dragon Age Elf Name Generator
description: Craft the perfect, lore-friendly Elven name for your Dragon Age character! Whether you're a Dalish wanderer or a city elf rebel, find a name that resonates with the ancient magic and tragic history of the Elves.
introduction: Dive into the world of Thedas and forge your Elven identity! This generator blends traditional Elven naming conventions with a touch of modern flair, ensuring your character stands out in the Dragon Age universe. Get ready to embrace your inner elf!
howToUse: Keep clicking until you find a name that whispers sweet nothings of adventure and intrigue.
Copy your chosen name and paste it into your Dragon Age character creation screen.
Prepare for epic quests, heart-wrenching choices, and maybe a little bit of elven romance. 😉

faqs.question: Are these names lore-accurate?
faqs.answer: We've done our best to capture the essence of Elven naming conventions in Dragon Age, drawing inspiration from existing characters and lore. While not *guaranteed* to be 100% canon, they'll certainly feel right at home in Thedas!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other fantasy settings?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! While designed with Dragon Age in mind, these names have a general Elven vibe that can work in various fantasy worlds. Feel free to adapt and modify them to suit your needs.

faqs.question: I don't like any of the generated names. What should I do?
faqs.answer: Keep clicking! Or, get creative! Use the generated names as inspiration and tweak them until you find something you love. Consider mixing and matching prefixes and suffixes.

faqs.question: Will this generator make me fluent in Elvish?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. This generator is powerful, but not *that* powerful. You'll still need to consult a proper language guide for that (or just wing it – we won't judge... much).

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: We're always open to suggestions! Feel free to send us your ideas – the more Elven, the merrier!

faqs.question: Is this generator free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes! Use it as much as you want. We just hope you find the perfect name for your Elven hero (or villain!).
